newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Stockpile ups amount of germanium on offer.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Stockpile ups amount of germanium on offer.

text.p: U.S. Defense National Stockpile Center said it now has authority to sell 6,000 kilograms of germanium in the current fiscal year which ends Sept 30.
The original authority allowed 4,000 kilos, but Stockpile had requested permission to sell an extra 2,000 kilos, if need be.
Stockpile only began selling germanium this year, and sold 1,317 kilos in its first offer in March, and therefore will have 4,683 kilos available in its next offering, due April 28.
